scripts.audit:axe: npm run audit:build && npx start-server-and-test "npx http-server out -p 4173 -s" http://127.0.0.1:4173 "npx @axe-core/cli http://127.0.0.1:4173 --tags wcag2a,wcag2aa --tags wcag21a,wcag21aa"
scripts.audit:lighthouse: npm run audit:build && npx lhci autorun --config=./lighthouserc.json
scripts.audit:accessibility: npm run audit:axe && npm run audit:lighthouse
